page.title: 14YOXALL_INDUSTRY
page.content: Leavlite,Bond End is a small factory which specialises in anodising aluminium for supply to the metal trade.It is a subsidiary of the firm Amari which has branches all over the country. The Yoxall depot is the head office for the Midland area.The employees work in shifts covering 24 hours. Duncan Smith,Thimble Hall Cottage,began in 1981 making furniture and restoring timber framed buildings.He is nowfully employed on restoration work and employs unskilled labour as required. There is a trout farm which supplies to the general public.A small publishing firm operates from the village called Curlew Countryside Publications.
